commits.author: Doron Cohen
Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew:
/** * If true, this StopFilter will preserve * positions of the incoming tokens (ie, accumulate and * set position increments of the removed stop tokens). * Generally, true is best as it does not * lose information (positions of the original tokens) * during indexing. * *

When set, when a token is stopped * (omitted), the position increment of the following * token is incremented. * *

NOTE: be sure to also * set {@link QueryParser#setEnablePositionIncrements} if * you use QueryParser to create queries. */ public void setEnablePositionIncrements(boolean enable) { this.enablePositionIncrements = enable; }
